response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I understand its worth to you is $10,000, and based on its value and the effort put into it, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and my goal to ensure you receive a product that truly meets your standards. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 11500}
